Lyrics: Mon cœur se recommande à vous,
Poetic Translation: My heart I leave you hopelessly,

Lyrics: Tout plein d'ennui et de martyre;
Poetic Translation: With hate for life upon it weighing;

Lyrics: Au moins en dépit des jaloux
Direct Translation: See translation at the Choral Public Domain Library.
Poetic Translation: At least, in spite of jealousy,
To hear you say goodbye I'm praying.

Lyrics: Ma bouche qui vous souloit sourire
Poetic Translation: My mouth that laughed once, smiling, playing,
That used to speak so wittily,
Now foul is, curses on them laying

Lyrics: Ceux qui m'ont banni de vos yeux.
Poetic Translation: Who from your eyes have banished me.
